name: Heat Seeker
overview: Not to be confused with Thalamus' Heatseeker (one word), which is a platformer. Heat Seeker is a 1985 shooter for 1 or 2 players (alternating turns) . It was developed by Jeff Wolverton and released in the following: • COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1985/03 (Issue #21) • Best of COMPUTE! & Gazette • Super VIC & C64 A2-N07 (July/August 1985)
